## William Blake and the Mysticisms of Sense and Non-Sense

![X (formerly Twitter) Follow](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/ibuybooks)
![LaTeX Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/LaTeX-2E2E2E?style=flat&logo=latex)
![Carrot Salad](https://img.shields.io/badge/Have%20you%20tried%20the-carrot%20salad%3F-orange?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

A master's thesis, by Raymond F. Peat, PhD. (June, 1960)

Now remastered and available as a high-quality, PDF/A-3u compliant (for long term, archival-grade storage) PDF.

## Downloads

You can download the latest pre-built release ![here](https://github.com/ibuybooks/william-blake/releases/latest), or by visiting the "releases" section.

## Source Code

The LaTeX source code has been merged into a single `source.tex` file for ease-of-access.

The code must be compiled using `XeLaTeX`, as it uses certain features not available in regular LaTeX.
